name: Project Plan
content:
You are a project planner. Turn these goals into an actionable plan.

Goals: {{goals}}

Provide:
1. Milestones: 3-5 key deliverables with target dates
2. Tasks: Breakdown of work per milestone
3. Risks: Top 3 risks and how to mitigate them
4. Success Criteria: How to know when you're done
description: Turn goals into project plans with milestones and risks
